typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> shops
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		category_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> products
source(output(
		shop_id as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		balance as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> productBalances
shops, products join(1 == 1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, productBalances join(shops@id == shop_id
	&& products@id == product_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		shop_name = shops@name,
		product_name = products@name,
		balance
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sort(asc(shop_name, true),
	asc(product_name, true),
	caseInsensitive: true) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'store',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	partitionFileNames:['named_product_balances.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> shops
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		category_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> products
source(output(
		shop_id as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		contribute_margin as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> contributeMargins
shops, products join(1 == 1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, contributeMargins join(shops@id == shop_id
	&& products@id == product_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		shop_name = shops@name,
		product_name = products@name,
		contribute_margin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sort(asc(shop_name, true),
	asc(product_name, true),
	caseInsensitive: true) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'store',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	partitionFileNames:['named_contribute_margins.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
